COMMAND.name: top
COMMAND.help: Go back to the main CLI level

COMMAND.name: up
COMMAND.help: Go back to the previous CLI menu level

COMMAND.name: mmx_settings config

PARAM.name: saveconfig
PARAM.help: Set true to save the current configuration of the device

PARAM.name: restoreconfig
PARAM.help: Set true to restore the saved configuration

PARAM.name: refreshdata
PARAM.help: Set true to refresh all run-time data of the device.

PARAM.name: reboot
PARAM.help: Set true to start system reboot.

PARAM.name: factoryreset
PARAM.help: Set true to start factory reset

PARAM.name: shutdown
PARAM.help: Set true to shutdown the device

COMMAND.ACTION: cliParams="" if [ ${saveconfig} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"SaveConfig = '${saveconfig}',";fi if [ ${restoreconfig} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"RestoreConfig = '${restoreconfig}',";fi if [ ${refreshdata} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"RefreshData = '${refreshdata}',";fi if [ ${reboot} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"Reboot = '${reboot}',";fi if [ ${factoryreset} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"FactoryReset = '${factoryreset}',";fi if [ ${shutdown} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"Shutdown = '${shutdown}',";fi cliParams=$(echo $cliParams | sed 's/,$//') if [ -z "$cliParams" ]; then cliParams = "null" echo "No parameter is specified for set operation" else /usr/lib/lua/mmx/mmx_cli_utils.lua mmObjInstance=Device.X_Inango_MMXSettings. sectionId=restarts_1 type=set cliParamsStr="$cliParams" fi
